description:
Dictation software that doesnâ€™t sacrifice accuracy

TalkType is a fast, simple, and accurate tool for dictation. It is the only dictation software in the DSA market that can cover all platforms, including Windows, macOS, Mobile (iOS and Android), and even within your browser, like Google Chrome. With TalkType, you can enjoy the convenience of using a single app or browser for all your dictation needs.
One of the best things about TalkType is that it is accurate 93.73% of the time. This means you can rely on it to accurately and efficiently transcribe your words. Even if you have difficulty spelling, TalkType can assist you as it is 100% accurate in spelling all words. You can trust that your dictated text will always be accurately spelt.
